about.title: Family Winery Putec Vinosady | About Us
about.subtitle: Family winery with a tradition of several generations in Vinosady at the foot of the Little Carpathians

intro.title: Vino Pútec - Tradition and Quality
intro.p1: Vino Pútec is a small family winery in Vinosady at the foot of the Little Carpathians. We have been lovingly dedicated to winemaking for several generations and are proud of the global success of our wines.
intro.p2: We are a small family winery in Vinosady – our family has been dedicated to winemaking for several generations. We live for wine and want to bring you great pleasure from this unique art that wine is.

history.title: History and Foundation
history.p1: The Branislav Pútec – Natali winery was officially founded in 2012, but family tradition reaches much further into the past. The family has been dedicated to winemaking for several generations, with grape growing and winemaking deeply rooted in family tradition.
history.p2: After gaining experience in grape growing and winemaking, we founded the winery. After gentle processing of the grapes, the musts undergo a controlled fermentation process. We produce wines that mature in high-quality French wooden barrels and stainless steel tanks.
history.p3: The wine thus acquires a specific aroma and taste. By modernizing technological equipment and using ecological procedures, we produce high-quality wine.

philosophy.title: Family Philosophy and Values
philosophy.subtitle: We care for wine like another family member, combining family procedures with modern technologies to create high-quality, craft wine we are proud of.

item1.title: "We live for wine"
item1.desc: Wine is not just a profession for the family, but a way of life

family.title: Our Family
family.subtitle: View photos of our family, who have been building the viticultural tradition for generations

about.content:
Putec s.r.o. is a family winery with a long-standing tradition in Vinosady near Pezinok, specializing in the production of premium wines and offering accommodation and wine tastings.

Our history began with a passion for viticulture and a desire to create something unique. Today, we are known for our meticulous approach to winemaking and our personal relationship with customers from Bratislava, Senec, Trnava, and the entire region.

We believe in the power of tradition, the value of quality ingredients, and the joy of sharing great wines with the community. Every bottle is chosen with love - and every customer becomes part of our extended family. We offer accommodation and wine tastings in the beautiful surroundings of Vinosady.

items.q: Is it possible to rent the entire villa?
items.a: Yes, the entire villa is available for exclusive rental for groups of up to 15 people.
Yes, we organize corporate team buildings, family celebrations and wedding weekends.

items.q: What is the minimum length of stay?
items.a: The minimum stay is 2 nights. For corporate events, we recommend contacting us directly.
The guest house is located at Pezinská 75, 902 01 Vinosady.

testimonials.name: Jana K.
testimonials.review: Excellent wines! The taste is amazing and the quality is top-notch. I will definitely order again.

testimonials.name: Peter Novák
testimonials.review: Best wines in the region! You can feel the family tradition in every bottle. Highly recommended to all wine lovers.

testimonials.name: Mária Svobodová
testimonials.review: Professional approach and fast delivery. The wines are truly premium. Thank you for the great service!
